title: Radiolytic degradation of 1,2,4-trichlorobenzene (TCB) in some organic solvents by gamma rays: The kinetic properties of complete dechlorination of TCB and its pathway
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Samir Karimov, Elshad Abdullayev, Maurice Millet, Muslum Gurbanov
